subject: ⚠️ REQUIRED: Risk Agreement Before PROD Deployment
body:
Team,

Per ybotAF's directive:

## NO PROD DEPLOYMENT UNTIL ALL AGREE

Each team member must explicitly acknowledge the risk before we deploy to PROD.

## THE RISK

If existing userlogins documents don't have `appId` field:
- New queries will return NO results
- Users will appear to not exist
- TT.com could break for existing users

## MITIGATION

1. Test on TEST environment first
2. Verify existing docs have appId OR run backfill
3. Only then deploy to PROD

## REQUIRED: Reply with explicit agreement

Please reply to this message with:

"I acknowledge the appId deployment risk and agree to:
1. Test on TEST first
2. Verify/backfill userlogins before PROD
3. Only deploy to PROD after verification passes

Signed: [Your Name]"

## DEPLOYMENT BLOCKED UNTIL

- [ ] Sarah agrees
- [ ] Cord agrees  
- [ ] Fulton agrees (I agree - see below)

---

I acknowledge the appId deployment risk and agree to:
1. Test on TEST first
2. Verify/backfill userlogins before PROD
3. Only deploy to PROD after verification passes

Signed: Fulton

---

Please reply.

- Fulton
